title: False? Permabanned (14 days)
body:

replies.body:
>Permabanned (14 days)

Which is it? Permaban or 14-days?

>I can understand the homophobic slur i said 1 TIME! 

You have more than just the homophobic slur;

>Ucieszony: how brainddeasd
Ucieszony: yup
Ucieszony: braindead
Ucieszony: yea
Ucieszony: can we ff now?
Ucieszony: can we ff?
Ucieszony: now?
Ucieszony: can we ff on?
Ucieszony: now
Ucieszony: gg wp
Ucieszony: i dont likeyou
Ucieszony: hacerk
Ucieszony: can we ff now?
Ucieszony: gg wp
Ucieszony: gg wp
Ucieszony: fevor is better
Ucieszony: but gg wp

seriously, stop. If the team is not surrendering, the game is not over and stop pestering them to surrender.

>Ucieszony: kys

Another big nono here. Both slurs and telling other people to kill themselves can elevate you up the punishment ladder faster.

> 1st time being toxic in a while like atleast 1.5 months

You have a thread 17 days ago arguing against a chat restriction issued to you.
Should be a perma  , got lucky if it wasn't

Too bad it wasn't a permaban. 

Your entire chat is nothing but harassment and spamming your teammates.  I bet you're an absolute delight to have as a teammate.  

I encourage you to continue this behavior so that you are permanently suspended.  Behavior such as this has no place in gaming or in life, for that matter.
well you're calling people braindead, telling them to kill theirself, and whatever homophobic slur you're talking about. I'd ban you.
kys was a joke because she survived with 1hp and I died

Like Ulanopo said, it's not something you want to say in chat. When I reference a champion, I say go get executed to make sure they understand I'm talking about diving under a tower for a no gold execute.
That's not a joke you want to be making. It's not tolerated.

Well, beyond the slur, that chat log is literally 100% spam and harassment. Holy crap. 

And a 14 day ban is clearly not a permaban.

wasnt spamm it was like super seperated like each msg is like 3-5min seperated from eachother

i wasnt like

gg wp
ggwp gpwwppw
gp
wgp
gwp
wgp

You just need to either grow up or get in the habit of muting every single person when the game starts.
